languages.text: "Вы все в своей Инквизиции — наглухо отбитые мрази, утратившие остатки человечности. Если тебе хватило насилия и смертей — уходим отсюда".
"You're a pack of soulless, unhinged animals — you and all your Inquisition cronies. Now, if you have had your fill of violence and death, we are leaving."
languages.original_text: "Вы все в своей Инквизиции — наглухо отбитые мрази, утратившие остатки человечности. Если тебе хватило насилия и смертей — уходим отсюда".

traits.locale_text: "You're a pack of soulless, unhinged animals — you and all your Inquisition cronies. Now, if you have had your fill of violence and death, we are leaving."
"You're a pack of soulless, unhinged animals — you and all your Inquisition cronies. Now, if you have had your fill of violence and death, we are leaving."
"You're a pack of soulless, unhinged animals — you and all your Inquisition cronies. Now, if you have had your fill of violence and death, we are leaving."
"You're a pack of soulless, unhinged animals — you and all your Inquisition cronies. Now, if you have had your fill of violence and death, we are leaving."

languages.text: “无论是你，还是你在审判庭的其他同僚，你们不过是一群没有灵魂、精神失常的畜生罢了。如果这一切暴力与死亡让你满意的话，那我们走吧。”
languages.original_text: "You're a pack of soulless, unhinged animals — you and all your Inquisition cronies. Now, if you have had your fill of violence and death, we are leaving."

traits.locale_text: “无论是你，还是你在审判庭的其他同僚，你们不过是一群没有灵魂、精神失常的畜生罢了。如果这一切暴力与死亡让你满意的话，那我们走吧。”

languages.text: «Tanto usted como el resto de los perros de la Inquisición son una caterva de animales salvajes y desalmados. Ahora, si ya ha tenido su dosis de violencia y muerte, nos marchamos».
languages.original_text: "You're a pack of soulless, unhinged animals — you and all your Inquisition cronies. Now, if you have had your fill of violence and death, we are leaving."

traits.locale_text: «Tanto usted como el resto de los perros de la Inquisición son una caterva de animales salvajes y desalmados. Ahora, si ya ha tenido su dosis de violencia y muerte, nos marchamos».

languages.text: 「あなた方は魂のない、自由を失った動物の群れです。あなた方も異端審問庁の仲間たちも全員です。暴力と死が満たされたなら、私たちは立ち去ります」
languages.original_text: "You're a pack of soulless, unhinged animals — you and all your Inquisition cronies. Now, if you have had your fill of violence and death, we are leaving."

traits.locale_text: 「あなた方は魂のない、自由を失った動物の群れです。あなた方も異端審問庁の仲間たちも全員です。暴力と死が満たされたなら、私たちは立ち去ります」

languages.text: « Vous n'êtes qu'une bande de bêtes sans âme, vous et tous les pions de l'Inquisition. À présent, si vous avez eu votre content de violence et de mort, nous partons. »
languages.original_text: "You're a pack of soulless, unhinged animals — you and all your Inquisition cronies. Now, if you have had your fill of violence and death, we are leaving."

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'êtes qu'une bande de bêtes sans âme, vous et tous les pions de l'Inquisition. À présent, si vous avez eu votre content de violence et de mort, nous partons. »

languages.text: "Ihr seid ein seelenloser Haufen gestörter Tiere – Ihr und all Eure Kumpanen von der Inquisition. Habt Ihr jetzt genug Gewalt und Tod gesehen? Ich möchte gehen."
languages.original_text: "You're a pack of soulless, unhinged animals — you and all your Inquisition cronies. Now, if you have had your fill of violence and death, we are leaving."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid ein seelenloser Haufen gestörter Tiere – Ihr und all Eure Kumpanen von der Inquisition. Habt Ihr jetzt genug Gewalt und Tod gesehen? Ich möchte gehen."

languages.text: "Ruhsuz ve kaçık bir hayvan sürüsüsünüz. Sen de, Engizisyon'daki bütün diğer dostların da. Bu kadar vahşet ve ölüm yettiyse artık gidelim."
languages.original_text: "You're a pack of soulless, unhinged animals — you and all your Inquisition cronies. Now, if you have had your fill of violence and death, we are leaving."

traits.locale_text: "Ruhsuz ve kaçık bir hayvan sürüsüsünüz. Sen de, Engizisyon'daki bütün diğer dostların da. Bu kadar vahşet ve ölüm yettiyse artık gidelim."
